price: Sabõda haka Muka hõre masa iska* tanã gudu da umurninsa, tãna tãshi da sauƙi, inda ya nufa.
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ
footnotes: * An hore masa iska matsayin dawãkin da ya yanke dõmin Allah. An hõre masa aljannu dõmin niyyarsa ta sãmun diya mãsu jihãdi dõmin Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
